definition: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
kjvTranslation: [idiom] after, [idiom] alike, as (soon as), because, [idiom] every, for, [phrase] forasmuch, [phrase] from whence, [phrase] how(-soever), [idiom] if, (so) that ((thing) which, wherein), [idiom] though, [phrase] until, [phrase] whatsoever, when, where ([phrase] -as, -in, -of, -on, -soever, -with), which, whilst, [phrase] whither(-soever), who(-m, -soever, -se). As it is indeclinable, it is often accompanied by the personal pronoun expletively, used to show the connection.

translations.bg: кой, кой, какво, че; също (като наречие и съюз) кога, къде, как, защото, за да и т.н.
translations.cs: kdo, který, co, že; také (jako příslovce a spojka) kdy, kde, jak, protože, aby atd.
translations.da: hvem, hvilken, hvad, at; også (som adverbium og konjunktion) hvornår, hvor, hvordan, fordi, for at osv.
translations.de: wer, was, was, das; auch (als Adverb und Konjunktion) wann, wo, wie, weil, damit, usw.
translations.el: ποιος, ποια, τι, αυτό- επίσης (ως επίρρημα και σύνδεσμος) πότε, πού, πώς, γιατί, για να, κ.λπ.
translations.es: who, which, what, that; también (como adverbio y conjunción) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
translations.et: kes, mis, mis, mis, et; ka (adverbina ja konjunktsioonina) millal, kus, kuidas, sest, selleks, et jne.
translations.fi: kuka, mikä, mikä, mitä, että; myös (adverbina ja konjunktiona) milloin, missä, miten, koska, jotta jne.
translations.fr: qui, qui, quoi, qui ; aussi (comme adverbe et conjonction) quand, où, comment, parce que, pour que, etc.
translations.hu: who, which, what, that; továbbá (határozószóként és kötőszóként) when, where, how, because, in order that, stb.
translations.id: siapa, yang, apa, bahwa; juga (sebagai kata keterangan dan konjungsi) ketika, di mana, bagaimana, karena, agar, dan lain-lain.
translations.it: chi, quale, cosa, che; anche (come avverbio e congiunzione) quando, dove, come, perché, affinché, ecc.
translations.ja: who,which,what,that；また（副詞および接続詞として）when,where,how,because,in order thatなど。
translations.ko: 누가, 어떤, 무엇, 그; 또한 (부사 및 접속사로서) 언제, 어디서, 어떻게, 왜냐하면, 순서대로 등
translations.lt: kas, kuris, kuris, kas, kad; taip pat (kaip prieveiksmis ir jungtukas) kada, kur, kaip, nes, kad ir t. t.
translations.lv: kurš, kurš, kas, kas, kas; arī (kā apstākļa vārds un apstākļa savienojums) kad, kur, kā, kā, jo, lai utt.
translations.nb: hvem, hvilken, hva, at; også (som adverb og konjunksjon) når, hvor, hvordan, fordi, for at osv.
translations.nl: wie, welke, wat, dat; ook (als bijwoord en voegwoord) wanneer, waar, hoe, omdat, opdat, enz.
translations.pl: who, which, what, that; również (jako przysłówek i spójnik) when, where, how, because, in order that itp.
translations.pt: quem, qual, o quê, isso; também (como advérbio e conjunção) quando, onde, como, porque, para que, etc.
translations.ro: cine, care, ce, că; de asemenea (ca adverb și conjuncție) când, unde, cum, pentru că, în scopul ca etc.
translations.ru: who, which, what, that; также (в качестве наречия и связки) when, where, how, because, in order that и т.д.
translations.sk: kto, ktorý, čo, že; tiež (ako príslovka a spojka) kedy, kde, ako, pretože, aby atď.
translations.sl: kdo, kateri, kaj, to; tudi (kot prislov in veznik) kdaj, kje, kako, ker, zato, da itd.
translations.sv: vem, vilken, vad, det; även (som adverb och konjunktion) när, var, hur, eftersom, för att, etc.
translations.tr: who, which, what, that; ayrıca (zarf ve bağlaç olarak) when, where, how, because, in order that, vb.
translations.uk: who, which, what, that; також (як прислівник і сполучник) when, where, how, because, for the purpose of that тощо.
translations.zh: who、which、what、that；也可（作为副词和连词）when、where、how、because、in order that 等。
